nodes.name: EMR Database Server
nodes.capabilities: Stores patient records, medical histories, and treatment plans. High-value target with administrative access to all patient data.

nodes.name: MRI Machine Workstation
nodes.capabilities: Controls MRI machine operations, accesses imaging data, connected to PACS network.

nodes.name: Dr. Sarah Wilson
nodes.capabilities: Senior physician with elevated privileges, access to restricted patient data and administrative functions.

nodes.name: Pharmacy System
nodes.capabilities: Manages drug inventory, prescription processing, and medication dispensing controls.
